entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:17 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 09:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: WSW 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing early this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
